sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO sms_ms_ord ( ORD_NO , ORD_NM , ORD_TYPE_CD , ORD_STAT_CD , B5C_ORD_NO , DLV_MODE_CD , DLV_DEST_CD , CUST_ID , ORD_SUM_AMT , ORD_ESTM_DT , ORD_REQ_DT , ORD_EXP_DT , ORD_HOPE_ARVL_DT , ORD_ARVL_DT , STD_XCHR_KIND_CD , STD_XCHR_AMT , BACT_REG_DT , BACT_REGR_EML , BACT_PRVD_DT , BACT_PRVD_AMT , BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT , PO_SCHD_DT , PYMT_PRVD_MODE_CONT , CTRT_TMPL_YN , SMPL_REQ_YN , QLFC_REQ_YN , CUST_ORD_PROC_CONT , PAPT_DPST_DT , PAPT_DPST_AMT , PAPT_DPST_RATE , RAPT_DPST_DT , RAPT_DPST_AMT , RAPT_DPST_RATE , WRHS_DLV_DT , WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD , DPTR_DLV_DT , DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD , ARVL_DLV_DT , ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD , PO_DLV_DT , PO_DLV_DEST_CD , ORD_MEMO_CONT ) VALUES ( #ordNo# , CASE WHEN #b5cOrdNo# IS NULL THEN CONCAT(#custId#, "_", #ordNo#) ELSE CONCAT("B5C_", #b5cOrdNo#) END , #ordTypeCd# , #ordStatCd# , #b5cOrdNo# , CASE WHEN #dlvModeCd# = 'FOB' THEN 'N000520100' WHEN #dlvModeCd# = 'CIF' THEN 'N000520200' WHEN #dlvModeCd# = 'EXW' THEN 'N000520300' ELSE #dlvModeCd# END ,#dlvDestCd# , #custId# , #ordSumAmt# , #ordEstmDt# , #ordReqDt# , #ordExpDt# , #ordHopeArvlDt# , #ordArvlDt# , #stdXchrKindCd# , #stdXchrAmt# , #bactRegDt# , #bactRegrEml# , #bactPrvdDt# , #bactPrvdAmt# , #bactPrvdMemoCont# , #poSchdDt# , #pymtPrvdModeCont# , #ctrtTmplYn# , #smplReqYn# , #qlfcReqYn# , #custOrdProcCont# , #paptDpstDt# , #paptDpstAmt# , #paptDpstRate# , #raptDpstDt# , #raptDpstAmt# , #raptDpstRate# , #wrhsDlvDt# , #wrhsDlvDestCd# , #dptrDlvDt# , #dptrDlvDestCd# , #arvlDlvDt# , #arvlDlvDestCd# , #poDlvDt# , #poDlvDestCd# , #ordMemoCont# )
INSERT INTO sms_ms_ord( ORD_NO , B5C_ORD_NO , ORD_STAT_CD ,ORD_NM ) VALUES ( #ordNo# , #b5cOrdNo# , #ordStatCd# , CONCAT("B5C_", #b5cOrdNo#) ) )
sqlMap.select:
SELECT IFNULL( max(CONVERT(ORD_NO, UNSIGNED))+1 , CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y%m%d"),"000") )
FROM sms_ms_ord WHERE ORD_NO LIKE CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y%m%d"),'%')
SELECT ORD_NO FROM sms_ms_ord WHERE B5C_ORD_NO = #b5cOrdNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sms_ms_ord SET ORD_NO=#ordNo# , ORD_NM=#ordNm# , ORD_TYPE_CD=#ordTypeCd# , ORD_STAT_CD=#ordStatCd# , B5C_ORD_NO=#b5cOrdNo# , DLV_MODE_CD=#dlvModeCd# , DLV_DEST_CD=#dlvDestCd# , CUST_ID=#custId# , ORD_SUM_AMT=#ordSumAmt# , ORD_ESTM_DT=#ordEstmDt# , ORD_REQ_DT=#ordReqDt# , ORD_EXP_DT=#ordExpDt# , ORD_HOPE_ARVL_DT=#ordHopeArvlDt# , ORD_ARVL_DT=#ordArvlDt# , STD_XCHR_KIND_CD=#stdXchrKindCd# , STD_XCHR_AMT=#stdXchrAmt# , BACT_REG_DT=#bactRegDt# , BACT_REGR_EML=#bactRegrEml# , BACT_PRVD_DT=#bactPrvdDt# , BACT_PRVD_AMT=#bactPrvdAmt# , BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT=#bactPrvdMemoCont# , PO_SCHD_DT=#poSchdDt# , PYMT_PRVD_MODE_CONT=#pymtPrvdModeCont# , CTRT_TMPL_YN=#ctrtTmplYn# , SMPL_REQ_YN=#smplReqYn# , QLFC_REQ_YN=#qlfcReqYn# , CUST_ORD_PROC_CONT=#custOrdProcCont# , PAPT_DPST_DT=#paptDpstDt# , PAPT_DPST_AMT=#paptDpstAmt# , PAPT_DPST_RATE=#paptDpstRate# , RAPT_DPST_DT=#raptDpstDt# , RAPT_DPST_AMT=#raptDpstAmt# , RAPT_DPST_RATE=#raptDpstRate# , WRHS_DLV_DT=#wrhsDlvDt# , WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD=#wrhsDlvDestCd# , DPTR_DLV_DT=#dptrDlvDt# , DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD=#dptrDlvDestCd# , ARVL_DLV_DT=#arvlDlvDt# , ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD=#arvlDlvDestCd# , PO_DLV_DT=#poDlvDt# , PO_DLV_DEST_CD=#poDlvDestCd# , ORD_MEMO_CONT=#ordMemoCont#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DLV_MODE_CD , DLV_DEST_CD , CUST_ID , ORD_ESTM_DT , ORD_REQ_DT , ORD_EXP_DT , ORD_HOPE_ARVL_DT , STD_XCHR_KIND_CD , STD_XCHR_AMT , PO_SCHD_DT , PYMT_PRVD_MODE_CONT , CTRT_TMPL_YN , SMPL_REQ_YN , QLFC_REQ_YN , CUST_ORD_PROC_CONT , ORD_MEMO_CONT , ORD_NM , ORD_STAT_CD FROM sms_ms_ord WHERE ORD_NO=#ordNo#
SELECT CD as cd ,CD_VAL as cdVal ,ETC as etc FROM tb_ms_cmn_cd WHERE substr(CD,1,6)=#cd#
SELECT ORD_NO , BACT_PRVD_DT , BACT_PRVD_AMT , BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT , BACT_REGR_EML , BACT_REG_DT , ORD_STAT_CD FROM sms_ms_ord WHERE ORD_NO=#ordNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sms_ms_ord SET BACT_PRVD_DT=#bactPrvdDt# , BACT_PRVD_AMT=#bactPrvdAmt# , BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT=#bactPrvdMemoCont# , BACT_REGR_EML=#bactRegrEml# , BACT_REG_DT=DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),"%Y%m%d") WHERE ORD_NO=#ordNo#

UPDATE sms_ms_ord SET CUST_ID=#custId# , ORD_REQ_DT=#ordReqDt# , ORD_HOPE_ARVL_DT=#ordHopeArvlDt# , STD_XCHR_AMT=#stdXchrAmt# , STD_XCHR_KIND_CD=#stdXchrKindCd# , PYMT_PRVD_MODE_CONT=#pymtPrvdModeCont# , DLV_MODE_CD=#dlvModeCd# , DLV_DEST_CD=#dlvDestCd# , ORD_ESTM_DT=#ordEstmDt# , ORD_EXP_DT=#ordExpDt# , CTRT_TMPL_YN=#ctrtTmplYn# , SMPL_REQ_YN=#smplReqYn# , PO_SCHD_DT=#poSchdDt# , QLFC_REQ_YN=#qlfcReqYn# , CUST_ORD_PROC_CONT=#custOrdProcCont# , ORD_MEMO_CONT=#ordMemoCont# WHERE ORD_NO=#ordNo#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT
A.ORD_NO AS ORD_NO ,A.ORD_REQ_DT AS ORD_REQ_DT ,A.CUST_ID AS CLIENT_NM ,(SELECT Z.ORD_GUDS_CNS_NM FROM sms_ms_ord_guds Z WHERE A.ORD_NO=Z.ORD_NO AND Z.ORD_GUDS_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(ORD_GUDS_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_guds Z WHERE Z.ORD_NO=A.ORD_NO) ) AS ORDERED_GUDS_NM ,CASE WHEN A.ORD_TYPE_CD = 'N000620300' THEN CONCAT(IFNULL (A.CUST_ID, "未知"),"_", A.ORD_NO) ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL ("B5C", "未知"),"_", A.B5C_ORD_NO) END AS SHOW_DETAIL ,A.ORD_SUM_AMT AS ORD_SUM_AMT
,(SELECT CONCAT(USER_ALAS_CNS_NM,"(",USER_ALAS_ENG_NM,")") FROM sms_ms_user Q, sms_ms_ord_user W WHERE Q.USER_EML=W.USER_EML AND Q.OGNZ_DIV_CD="N000530100" AND A.ORD_NO=W.ORD_NO) AS CNS_MNG ,A.ORD_TYPE_CD AS ORD_TYPE_CD ,(SELECT CONCAT(C.ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM," ",C.ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist C WHERE C.ORD_NO = A.ORD_NO AND C.ORD_HIST_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(J.ORD_HIST_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist J WHERE J.ORD_NO=A.ORD_NO ) ) AS HIST_DETAIL ,A.ORD_STAT_CD AS ORD_STAT_CD ,A.BACT_PRVD_DT AS BACT_PRVD_DT ,A.BACT_PRVD_AMT AS BACT_PRVD_AMT ,A.PAPT_DPST_DT AS PAPT_DPST_DT ,A.PAPT_DPST_AMT AS PAPT_DPST_AMT ,A.PAPT_DPST_RATE AS PAPT_DPST_RATE ,A.WRHS_DLV_DT AS WRHS_DLV_DT ,A.WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD AS WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.DPTR_DLV_DT AS DPTR_DLV_DT ,A.DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD AS DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.ARVL_DLV_DT AS ARVL_DLV_DT ,A.ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD AS ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.PO_DLV_DT AS PO_DLV_DT ,A.PO_DLV_DEST_CD AS PO_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.RAPT_DPST_DT AS RAPT_DPST_DT ,A.RAPT_DPST_AMT AS RAPT_DPST_AMT ,A.RAPT_DPST_RATE AS RAPT_DPST_RATE ,A.ORD_MEMO_CONT AS ORD_MEMO_CONT ,A.B5M_BUY_CONT AS B5M_BUY_CONT ,A.B5C_GUDS_REG_DT AS B5C_GUDS_REG_DT ,A.B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO AS B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO ,A.BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT AS BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT ,A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD AS STD_XCHR_KIND_CD ,A.STD_XCHR_AMT AS STD_XCHR_AMT
,ROUND(CASE WHEN A.ORD_STAT_CD IN ('N000550100', 'N000550200', 'N000550500') THEN CASE WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT / B.USD_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * B.RMB_XCHR_AMT / B.USD_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * A.STD_XCHR_AMT / B.USD_XCHR_AMT END WHEN A.ORD_STAT_CD IN ('N000550300', 'N000550400') THEN CASE WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT / B.USD_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * B.RMB_XCHR_AMT / B.USD_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * C.STD_XCHR_AMT / B.USD_XCHR_AMT END END,2) AS USD_XCHR_AMT ,ROUND(CASE WHEN A.ORD_STAT_CD IN ('N000550100', 'N000550200', 'N000550500') THEN CASE WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * B.USD_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * A.STD_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * A.STD_XCHR_AMT END WHEN A.ORD_STAT_CD IN ('N000550300', 'N000550400') THEN CASE WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * B.USD_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * C.STD_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * C.STD_XCHR_AMT END END,2) AS KRW_XCHR_AMT ,ROUND(CASE WHEN A.ORD_STAT_CD IN ('N000550100', 'N000550200', 'N000550500') THEN CASE WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * B.USD_XCHR_AMT / B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND A.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT * A.STD_XCHR_AMT / B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT / B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' THEN A.ORD_SUM_AMT END WHEN A.ORD_STAT_CD IN ('N000550300', 'N000550400') THEN CASE WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * B.USD_XCHR_AMT / B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590100' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT * C.STD_XCHR_AMT / B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT / B.RMB_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590200' AND C.STD_XCHR_AMT IS NOT NULL THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT / C.STD_XCHR_AMT WHEN C.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD = 'N000590300' THEN C.PO_SUM_AMT END END,2) CNS_XCHR_AMT ,A.DPST_XCHR_CD AS DPST_XCHR_CD FROM sms_ms_ord A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ms_xchr B ON xchr_std_dt = period_add(date_format(now(), "%Y%m"), -1) LEFT OUTER JOIN sms_ms_estm C ON A.ord_no = C.ORD_NO WHERE 1=1
AND ORD_NO = #ordNo#
AND ORD_REQ_DT = #ordReqDt#
AND CUST_ID = #custId#
AND CNS_MNG = #cnsMng#
AND KOR_MNG = #korMng#
AND ORD_TYPE_CD = #ordTypeCd#
AND ORD_STAT_CD = #ordStatCd#
AND A.ord_no IN (SELECT B.ord_no FROM sms_ms_ord_guds B WHERE B.ord_guds_kor_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%') OR B.ord_guds_cns_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%') OR B.ord_guds_upc_id = #searchKeyword#)
ORDER BY ORD_NO DESC LIMIT #start#,#row#

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM sms_ms_ord A LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_ms_xchr B ON xchr_std_dt = period_add(date_format(now(), "%Y%m"), -1) WHERE 1=1
AND ORD_NO = #ordNo#
AND ORD_REQ_DT = #ordReqDt#
AND CUST_ID = #custId#
AND CNS_MNG = #cnsMng#
AND KOR_MNG = #korMng#
AND ORD_TYPE_CD = #ordTypeCd#
AND ORD_STAT_CD = #ordStatCd#
AND A.ord_no IN (SELECT B.ord_no FROM sms_ms_ord_guds B WHERE B.ord_guds_kor_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%') OR B.ord_guds_cns_nm LIKE CONCAT('%', #searchKeyword#, '%') OR B.ord_guds_upc_id = #searchKeyword#)

SELECT
A.ORD_NO AS ORD_NO ,A.ORD_REQ_DT AS ORD_REQ_DT ,A.CUST_ID AS CLIENT_NM ,(SELECT Z.ORD_GUDS_CNS_NM FROM sms_ms_ord_guds Z WHERE A.ORD_NO=Z.ORD_NO AND Z.ORD_GUDS_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(ORD_GUDS_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_guds Z WHERE Z.ORD_NO=A.ORD_NO) ) AS ORDERED_GUDS_NM ,CASE WHEN A.ORD_TYPE_CD = 'N000620300' THEN CONCAT(IFNULL (A.CUST_ID, "未知"),"_", A.ORD_NO) ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL ("B5C", "未知"),"_", A.B5C_ORD_NO) END AS SHOW_DETAIL ,A.ORD_SUM_AMT AS ORD_SUM_AMT ,(SELECT CONCAT(USER_ALAS_CNS_NM,"(",USER_ALAS_ENG_NM,")") FROM sms_ms_user Q, sms_ms_ord_user W WHERE Q.USER_EML=W.USER_EML AND Q.OGNZ_DIV_CD="N000530100" AND A.ORD_NO=W.ORD_NO) AS CNS_MNG
,A.ORD_TYPE_CD AS ORD_TYPE_CD ,A.ORD_STAT_CD AS ORD_STAT_CD ,(SELECT CONCAT(C.ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM," ",C.ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist C WHERE C.ORD_NO = A.ORD_NO AND C.ORD_HIST_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(J.ORD_HIST_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist J WHERE J.ORD_NO=A.ORD_NO ) ) AS HIST_DETAIL ,A.ORD_STAT_CD AS ORD_STAT_CD ,A.BACT_PRVD_DT AS BACT_PRVD_DT ,A.BACT_PRVD_AMT AS BACT_PRVD_AMT ,A.PAPT_DPST_DT AS PAPT_DPST_DT ,A.PAPT_DPST_AMT AS PAPT_DPST_AMT ,A.PAPT_DPST_RATE AS PAPT_DPST_RATE ,A.WRHS_DLV_DT AS WRHS_DLV_DT ,A.WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD AS WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.DPTR_DLV_DT AS DPTR_DLV_DT ,A.DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD AS DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.ARVL_DLV_DT AS ARVL_DLV_DT ,A.ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD AS ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.PO_DLV_DT AS PO_DLV_DT ,A.PO_DLV_DEST_CD AS PO_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.RAPT_DPST_DT AS RAPT_DPST_DT ,A.RAPT_DPST_AMT AS RAPT_DPST_AMT ,A.RAPT_DPST_RATE AS RAPT_DPST_RATE ,A.ORD_MEMO_CONT AS ORD_MEMO_CONT ,A.B5M_BUY_CONT AS B5M_BUY_CONT
,A.BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT AS BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT ,A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD AS STD_XCHR_KIND_CD ,A.STD_XCHR_AMT AS STD_XCHR_AMT ,A.B5C_GUDS_REG_DT AS B5C_GUDS_REG_DT ,A.B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO AS B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO ,A.DPST_XCHR_CD AS DPST_XCHR_CD FROM sms_ms_ord A WHERE 1=1
AND ORD_NO = #ordNo#

SELECT
A.ORD_NO AS ORD_NO ,A.ORD_REQ_DT AS ORD_REQ_DT ,A.CUST_ID AS CLIENT_NM ,(SELECT Z.ORD_GUDS_CNS_NM FROM sms_ms_ord_guds Z WHERE A.ORD_NO=Z.ORD_NO AND Z.ORD_GUDS_SEQ = (SELECT MIN(ORD_GUDS_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_guds Z WHERE Z.ORD_NO=A.ORD_NO) ) AS ORDERED_GUDS_NM ,CASE WHEN A.ORD_TYPE_CD = 'N000620300' THEN CONCAT(IFNULL (A.CUST_ID, "未知"),"_", A.ORD_NO) ELSE CONCAT(IFNULL ("B5C", "未知"),"_", A.B5C_ORD_NO) END AS SHOW_DETAIL ,A.ORD_SUM_AMT AS ORD_SUM_AMT ,(SELECT CONCAT(USER_ALAS_CNS_NM,"(",USER_ALAS_ENG_NM,")") FROM sms_ms_user Q, sms_ms_ord_user W WHERE Q.USER_EML=W.USER_EML AND Q.OGNZ_DIV_CD="N000530100" AND A.ORD_NO=W.ORD_NO) AS CNS_MNG ,(SELECT CONCAT(USER_ALAS_CNS_NM,"(",USER_ALAS_ENG_NM,")") FROM sms_ms_user Q, sms_ms_ord_user W WHERE Q.USER_EML=W.USER_EML AND Q.OGNZ_DIV_CD="N000530200" AND A.ORD_NO=W.ORD_NO) AS KOR_MNG ,(SELECT CD_VAL FROM tb_ms_cmn_cd W WHERE W.CD = A.ORD_TYPE_CD) AS ORD_TYPE_CD
,(SELECT CD_VAL FROM tb_ms_cmn_cd W WHERE W.CD = A.ORD_STAT_CD) AS ORD_STAT_CD ,(SELECT CONCAT(C.ORD_HIST_REG_DTTM," ",C.ORD_HIST_HIST_CONT) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist C WHERE C.ORD_NO = A.ORD_NO AND C.ORD_HIST_SEQ = (SELECT MAX(J.ORD_HIST_SEQ) FROM sms_ms_ord_hist J WHERE J.ORD_NO=A.ORD_NO ) ) AS HIST_DETAIL ,(SELECT CD_VAL FROM tb_ms_cmn_cd W WHERE W.CD = A.ORD_STAT_CD) AS ORD_STAT_CD ,A.BACT_PRVD_DT AS BACT_PRVD_DT ,A.BACT_PRVD_AMT AS BACT_PRVD_AMT ,A.PAPT_DPST_DT AS PAPT_DPST_DT ,A.PAPT_DPST_AMT AS PAPT_DPST_AMT ,A.PAPT_DPST_RATE AS PAPT_DPST_RATE ,A.WRHS_DLV_DT AS WRHS_DLV_DT ,A.WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD AS WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.DPTR_DLV_DT AS DPTR_DLV_DT ,A.DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD AS DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.ARVL_DLV_DT AS ARVL_DLV_DT ,A.ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD AS ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.PO_DLV_DT AS PO_DLV_DT ,A.PO_DLV_DEST_CD AS PO_DLV_DEST_CD ,A.RAPT_DPST_DT AS RAPT_DPST_DT ,A.RAPT_DPST_AMT AS RAPT_DPST_AMT ,A.RAPT_DPST_RATE AS RAPT_DPST_RATE ,A.ORD_MEMO_CONT AS ORD_MEMO_CONT ,A.B5M_BUY_CONT AS B5M_BUY_CONT
,A.BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT AS BACT_PRVD_MEMO_CONT ,A.STD_XCHR_KIND_CD AS STD_XCHR_KIND_CD ,A.STD_XCHR_AMT AS STD_XCHR_AMT ,A.B5C_GUDS_REG_DT AS B5C_GUDS_REG_DT ,A.B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO AS B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO ,A.DPST_XCHR_CD AS DPST_XCHR_CD FROM sms_ms_ord A WHERE 1=1
AND ORD_NO = #ordNo#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE sms_ms_ord SET ORD_SUM_AMT = #ordSumAmt# ,BACT_PRVD_DT = #bactPrvdDt# ,BACT_PRVD_AMT = #bactPrvdAmt# ,PAPT_DPST_DT = #paptDpstDt# ,PAPT_DPST_AMT = #paptDpstAmt# ,PAPT_DPST_RATE = #paptDpstRate# ,WRHS_DLV_DT = #wrhsDlvDt# ,WRHS_DLV_DEST_CD = #wrhsDlvDestCd# ,DPTR_DLV_DT = #dptrDlvDt# ,DPTR_DLV_DEST_CD = #dptrDlvDestCd# ,ARVL_DLV_DT = #arvlDlvDt# ,ARVL_DLV_DEST_CD = #arvlDlvDestCd# ,PO_DLV_DT = #poDlvDt# ,PO_DLV_DEST_CD = #poDlvDestCd# ,RAPT_DPST_DT = #raptDpstDt# ,RAPT_DPST_AMT = #raptDpstAmt# ,RAPT_DPST_RATE = #raptDpstRate# ,B5M_BUY_CONT = #b5mBuyCont# ,B5C_GUDS_REG_DT = #b5cGudsRegDt# ,B5C_GUDS_REG_MEMO = #b5cGudsRegMemo# ,DPST_XCHR_CD =#dpstXchrCd# WHERE ORD_NO=#ordNo#
UPDATE sms_ms_ord SET ORD_STAT_CD = #ordStatCd# WHERE ORD_NO = #ordNo#
